content: maintaining main pattern > remove the markers after the first short row on each side break yarn and place 56 sts for left front on a holder > work short row every 7 sts 6 times on each side > at the end 8 repeats of main pattern will have been worked sec 3 right front across the stitches use 3 6mm/jp5 circular needle end german short row setup with rs facing place the rightmost 44 sts r15-32 work r15-32 of back shoulders chart flat see page 7 held from sec 2 on the needle > 1 repeat of main pattern has been worked over the row r33-64 work r1-32 of nuki chart flat see page 6 join yarn and work right front flat > 2 repeats of main pattern have been worked over the row in total r1-24 work r1-24 of right front chart flat see page 9 break yarn and place 134 sts for back yoke on a holder > 12 sts increased 56 sts total sec 2 left front don t break yarn and continue to sec 4 remove the crocheted provisional cast-on from sec 1 place the 134 sts on a holder 3 / 10 sec 4 front yoke sec 6 hem join left front and right front change to 3 3mm/jp4 circular needle work front yoke flat r1-28 sm p1 k1 tbl p1 k2 tbl 43 times p1 k1 tbl r1 work front yoke chart sts 1 43 co22 using loop cast-on p1 k2 tbl 2 times p1 k1 tbl p1 k2 tbl 43 times place 56 left front sts on the left-hand needle and p1 k1 tbl p1 k2 tbl 2 times work front yoke chart sts 66 92 see page 10 > 134 sts total change to 3 0mm/jp3 circular needle r2-18 work r2-18 of front yoke chart flat see page 10 > 1 repeat of main pattern has been worked over the row r29 sm k to m r19-50 work r1-32 of nuki chart flat see page 6 r30 sm p to m > 1 more repeat of main pattern have been worked over the row bobble all stitches knitwise 2 repeats in total sec 7 sleeves don t break yarn and continue to sec 5 use 3 6mm/jp5 circular needle sec 5 body join yarn and work sleeve in the round join front yoke and back yoke setup pick up and knit 92 sts work body in the round beginning at the center of the underarm pm for bor join to work in the round r1 work r1 of nuki chart co5 using loop cast-on > pick up 5 sts from the underarm co place 134 back yoke sts on the left-hand needle and > pick up 87 sts from front yoke and back yoke work r1 of nuki chart co5 using loop cast-on approximately pick up 2sts per 3rows pm for bor join to work in the round see page 6 > 92 sts total > 278 sts total r1-9
